error.signature: Error: Dynamic server usage: Route couldn't be rendered statically
error.regex: Dynamic server usage|couldn't be rendered statically

verdict.summary: Using dynamic APIs (cookies, headers, searchParams) in statically rendered route.

dead_ends.action: Add export const dynamic = 'force-dynamic' to everything
dead_ends.why_fails: Disables all static optimization, defeats Next.js purpose

dead_ends.action: Wrap in try/catch and return fallback

workarounds.action: Use dynamic = 'force-dynamic' only on routes that genuinely need it
workarounds.how: Use dynamic = 'force-dynamic' only on routes that genuinely need it

workarounds.action: Move dynamic data fetching to client components with useEffect

frequently_confused_with.distinction: 'Error' is a build_error error while 'Error' has a different failure mode despite similar symptoms. Check error message details to differentiate.
